alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:32PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Oxford and southeastern Franklin Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 732 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Weld to near Bethel to 12 miles west of Waterford. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Farmington, Fryeburg, Bethel, Rumford, Jay, Dixfield, Canton, Andover, Waterford, Weld, Wilton, Mexico, Buckfield, Hartford, Lovell, Greenwood, Carthage, Avon, Chatham and Hanover. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford
